import React, { useState } from 'react' import { addusers } from './UseReducer' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function CreateUser() { const [id,setId] = useState("") const [name,setName] = useState("") const [email ,setEmail] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch(); const users = useSelector(state=>state.users); console.log(users) const handleSubmit= (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(addusers({id,name,email})) } return (
